title: Marketer
welcomeText:
# Rajat's Private Letters

Get exclusive updates, behind-the-scenes insights, and learnings as I navigate my journey towards an independent creative career.

Receive 100% authentic, raw, and unfiltered letters delivered straight to your inbox, once a month.
